ToolProficiencyFeature.Name: Bracers of Archery
ToolProficiencyFeature.Text: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow

BonusFeature.Name: Bracers of Archery
BonusFeature.Text: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with longbows or shortbows

MagicProperty.Name: Bracers of Archery
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow, and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with such weapons.
